about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey through a vibrant, hand-drawn world where fast-paced combat and exploration collide! In Breaking Gates, you take on the role of a brave recruit tasked with saving a kingdom on the brink of collapse. From lush forests to ancient ruins, uncover the secrets of a kingdom filled with mystery and danger.

At your disposal are powerful skills and abilities that allow you to chain together devastating combos, perform aerial attacks, and unleash powerful super moves. Fight your way through the world by defeating fearsome enemies, upgrading your arsenal, and mastering a variety of combat techniques. As you delve deeper into the world, you’ll discover hidden treasures, unlock secret passages, and face imposing bosses in battles that will test your reflexes and strategy.

Key Features:

A Hand-Drawn Adventure:

Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted world filled with vibrant, hand-drawn animations and a colorful art style.

Fast-Paced Combat:

Master a combat system that’s easy to learn, yet challenging to master. Chain together combos, perform aerial maneuvers, and unleash spectacular special moves to dominate your enemies.

Epic Boss Fights:

Challenge imposing foes in battles that require quick reflexes, strategic thinking, and sharp skills.

Exploration and Discovery:

Travel through a sprawling world filled with hidden secrets, rare treasures, and ancient mysteries waiting to be uncovered.

Customization and Crafting:

Collect materials to forge powerful new gear, enhance your abilities, and shape your hero’s fighting style.

A Tale of Adventure:

Immerse yourself in a fun-filled story filled with danger and discovery as you fight to protect the kingdom.

Exclusive Soundtrack:

Enjoy a captivating original soundtrack designed to amplify the thrill and excitement of your adventure.

Breaking Gates combines the intensity of action-RPG combat with the charm of classic 2D platformers, delivering a rich experience for fans of exploration, strategy, and adrenaline-pumping battles. Are you ready to break through the gates and save the kingdom?

highlighted.name: Bottling the Fame and Cooking the Glory!
I'm the only one able to bear!

name: Breaking Gates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Amd Athlon X2 or intel core 2 duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Venture into a vibrant, hand-drawn world in this action-packed 2D RPG! Master fast-paced combat, uncover hidden secrets, and forge powerful gear as you embark on a thrilling journey to save a kingdom on the brink of collapse.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Polish, Vietnamese
